first.question: You changed the clean bedding for your bed just over a week ago.
answers: You change your pillowcase with a new clean pillowcase
You change all your bedding to clean ones because you’ve been sweating so much lately
For safety, you will change all bedding, pillows and blankets
You do nothing

kaksiviikkoa.question: Now, more than two weeks have passed since the last time you changed all your bedding. What do you do?
answers: You change your bedding with clean ones
You change the pillowcase, but not other bedding
You do nothing

vanhatpois.question: What do you do with old bedding?
answers: You remove the pillowcase, the duvet cover and the bed sheet and take them all to the laundry basket
You leave the old bedding on the bed and put the new ones on top of them
You throw old bedding in the trash

tosikauan.question: Two months have passed since the previous bedding change. You will notice that there is dust and sand on top of the duvet cover, and the bedding smells stuffy. What do you do?
answers: Nothing
You change the clean bedding and put yourself a reminder to remember to change the bedding earlier next time
You throw dirty bedding in the trash and go buy new ones from the store

peittotyyny.question: How often do you wash the pillow and blanket?
answers: Blanket every two months, pillow once a month
Blanket once a year, pillow every four months
Blanket twice a year, pillow every three months
Blanket once every three years, pillow once a year
Never

uudettilalle.question: How do you change new bedding?
answers: You throw them on the floor to wait for time to take your old bedding to the laundry
You lift the pillow onto the shelf to wait to get a clean sheet spread on the bed
You are not in the mood of putting clean sheets in place, so you decide to sleep without bedding
You first ventilate the bedroom and vacuum the bed before putting clean bedding in place

pölylakana.question: The new clean bed sheet will pick up dust from the floor.
answers: You put it on your bed nonetheless
You go to shake the sheet on the balcony and then put it on your bed. You decide not to put clean bedding on a dirty floor next time.
You will need to put a dusty sheet in the laundry and replace it with a new one

makuuhuoneensiivous.question: After a few days, you will clean your bedroom and at the same time would like to freshen up your bedding. What do you do?
answers: Take the blanket to the balcony for a moment to ventilate
Take the blanket out to ventilate
You spray a lot of perfume on the blanket

sadesää.question: You notice that it's starting to rain.
answers: You get the blanket back inside so that it does not get wet
You leave the blanket outside

märkäpeitto.question: Your blanket gets wet in the rain and is now quite wet.
answers: You leave the blanket out for the rest of the week and hope the weather gets sunnier and the blanket dries on its own
You get the blanket inside and hang it to dry
You throw the blanket in the trash and buy a new one to replace it
